text: Shakil Hossain (born 22 April 2000) is a Bangladeshi cricketer. He made his List A debut for Brothers Union in the 2017–18 Dhaka Premier Division Cricket League on 17 February 2018. Prior to his List A debut, he was part of Bangladesh's squad for the 2018 Under-19 Cricket World Cup. He made his Twenty20 debut for Abahani Limited in the 2018–19 Dhaka Premier Division Twenty20 Cricket League on 25 February 2019. ==References== ==External links== * Category:2000 births Category:Living people Category:Bangladeshi cricketers Category:Abahani Limited cricketers Category:Brothers Union cricketers Category:Place of birth missing (living people)
title: Shakil Hossain
